channel.title: Need Help With Connecting To Server
channel.description: When i Connect To My Server + Client. It Work's Fine When It's Set To 127.0.0.1 But When i Type My ip in My Client + Source Which IS "ZapxScape.no-ip.biz" It Say's Can Not Connect im PortFowarding With UTorrent. I Dont UnderStand But When i Change The Source To My ip But my Client Set To. 127.0.0.1 it work's but im trying to make it so people can join please help!!? Btw Does Listing on port 127.0.0.1 ect. do i have to put my ip or my server please help

item.title: Need Help With Connecting To Server

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I recommend you review all you’ve done with the “How to Start a Server” tutorial, which can be found here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Also, I don't think you should be creating a server with a player-base if you can't solve this, but that's just me speaking.
